amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to H-1B visas.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1025 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 1025 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S1997-1998; text: CR S1997) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to H-1B visas.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1025 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Hatch.
